post.body: Yep. I'm doing the dishes. Living the life, right?
Awesome, thanks. I was never really clear on his username. I blame all the booze.
who do I need to ask about booking a show at J. Clyde's? We're looking for early Feb.
thanks! We're excited, but I really hate moving...
only a half-mile or so from our current place. Still in Greenfield.
yep. About a half-mile from our current place.
It's funny to me when the battery starts to die in my fuzz pedal 'cuz it makes my guitar sound like a fart.
Fuckin' struggling with these flyers. Time to put away my perfectionist side.
Man. I need to force myself to work on this flyer. Creative juices just aren't flowing today...
Man, I need a haircut again already? Laaaaaaazy today.
Holy balls. Gary Fisher might be one of the strangest people in the world. I guess he can afford to be, though...
Drank some coffee. Celebrating the New Year all alone 'cuz the rest of the family just went to bed. Radical.
I don't watch much tv, but Eureka on DVD is pretty rad.
Sipping a brew, having finished lunch. It's a good day.
Oh, hey. My band (myspace.com/smashandgrabindy) is playing the Melody Inn on January 31. You should come.
Heating up the oven for my lunch salmon. I need to lose weight.
Ah, ace of cakes. your siren song is sweet, but alas. I must have some rest tonight.
Trying to calm down enough to sleep. Babysitting drunk bassists is not a good way to close a night.
Oh , and in more exciting news, wife and I bought a house today.
Listening to my band put vocals on a new song. Only took me a few tries to nail my part - stoked.
